name: Alicia Quatermain: Secrets Of The Lost Treasures
description: Alicia Quatermain sets out on a long and dangerous journey to find out why her father had disappeared under mysterious circumstances
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 resolution DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: With OpenAL support
